us.cost: $24.99/season for WNBA League Pass, $69.99/month for Hulu + Live TV
us.restrictions: Some games may be blacked out locally. National broadcasts are exclusive to ABC, ESPN, CBS Sports Network, and ION.
us.additionalInfo: WNBA League Pass offers both live and on-demand viewing. Local team games are typically blacked out on League Pass. Regional sports networks and local TV stations also broadcast games.

ca.cost: CAD 24.99/season for WNBA League Pass, CAD 19.99/month for TSN Direct
ca.restrictions: Some games may not be available due to regional broadcast rights
ca.additionalInfo: TSN broadcasts select WNBA games in Canada

gb.cost: Â£24.99/season for WNBA League Pass, varies for Sky Sports packages
gb.restrictions: No local blackouts, but some games may not be available live due to broadcasting rights
gb.additionalInfo: Sky Sports shows select WNBA games

au.cost: AUD 24.99/season for WNBA League Pass, AUD 25/month for Kayo Sports (includes ESPN)
au.additionalInfo: ESPN shows select WNBA games through Foxtel and Kayo Sports
